snippet.title: Loplight Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play now on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2074690/Loplight/

Itch:
https://scumhead.itch.io/loplight

Loplight is a twin-stick shooter taking inspirations from Hermetic lore and old alchemical concepts. Explore the ruins of this world, find out who's responsible, and defeat the monstrous creatures blocking your path.
